summary: The ClvpTokenizer class implements a byte‑level BPE tokenizer tailored for the CLVP model. It loads a vocabulary and merges file, handles special tokens (bos, eos, pad, unk), supports optional prefix spaces, and provides methods for tokenization, conversion between tokens and IDs, building inputs with special tokens, and saving the vocabulary.
business_intent: Provide robust tokenization and preprocessing for CLVP models, enabling consistent handling of text inputs, special tokens, and byte‑pair encoding for downstream speech or language tasks.
